author: Joseph Zucker
title: 50 MLB Players Partner to Provide More Than 4M Meals to Address Childhood Hunger
description: A group of 50  MLB  players raised almost $1 million toward the  COVID -19 pandemic relief effort.  The donation will help provide more than 4 million meals for children impacted by the pandemic...
content:
Al Bello/Getty Images
A group of 50 MLB players raised almost $1 million toward the COVID-19 pandemic relief effort.
The donation will help provide more than 4 million meals for children impacted by the pandemic. Justin Verlander, Clayton Kershaw, Albert Pu… [+1348 chars]
